upload.label: Upload
upload.description: Upload a file from your desktop or choose one from your gallery

account_activation_subtitle: Account activation link sent to your email address: {email} Please follow the link inside to continue.
Allowed-ext: Allowed JPG, GIF or PNG. Max size of 800K
confirmation-msg-1: Are you sure you want to delete this account?
confirmation-msg-2: Once you delete this account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
confirmation-msg-3: Are you sure you want to log Out From Other Browsers?
passwordRequirements_1: Minimum 8 characters long - the more, the better
passwordRequirements_3: At least one number, symbol, or whitespace character

title.label: Title
title.description: A catchy title can help you hook viewers. When you create video titles, it’s a good idea to include keywords your audience is likely to use when looking for videos like yours.

difficulty.label: Difficulty
difficulty.description: Specify the difficulty level of the course to help users understand the skill level required.

prerequisite.label: Prerequisite
prerequisite.description: List any prerequisites or recommended skills that viewers should have before taking this course.

description.label: Description
description.description: Provide a detailed description of the course content, objectives, and what learners can expect to gain from it.

details.title: Course Details
details.subtitle: Provide detailed information about your course

chapters.title: Chapters
chapters.subtitle: Organize your content into chapters for a structured learning experience

quizzes.title: Quizzes
quizzes.subtitle: Organize your content into Quizzes for a structured learning experience

visibility.title: Visibility
visibility.subtitle: Choose when to publish and who can see your video

title.label: Title
title.description: A catchy title can help you hook viewers. When you create video titles, it’s a good idea to include keywords your audience is likely to use when looking for videos like yours.

watermark.label: Watermark
watermark.description: This text will be added to your assets to protect you. You can use normal text or %user_name% to display your student's name on the asset. This way, when someone tries to steal it, you will know who stole it.

download.label: Download
download.description: Toggle this option to allow users to download this asset.

visibility.label: Visibility
visibility.description: Choose who can see this media, such as everyone, registered users, or specific groups.
